Name: Apple corer
Purpose in food preparation: To remove the core and pips from apples and similar fruits

Name: Apple cutter
Purpose in food preparation: To cut apple and similar fruits easily while simultaneously removing the core and pips.

Name: Baster
Purpose in food preparation: Used during cooking to cover meat in its own juices or with a sauce.

Name: Biscuit cutter
Alternative names: Biscuit mould, Cookie cutter, Cookie mould
Purpose in food preparation: Shaping biscuit dough

Name: Biscuit press
Purpose in food preparation: A device for making pressed cookies such as spritzgebäck.

Name: Blow torch
Purpose in food preparation: Commonly used to create a hard layer of caramelized sugar in a crème brûlée.

Name: Boil over preventer
Alternative names: Milk watcher, Milk guard, Pot minder
Purpose in food preparation: Preventing liquids from boiling over outside of the pot

Name: Bottle opener
Purpose in food preparation: Twists the metal cap off of a bottle

Name: Bowl
Purpose in food preparation: To hold food, including food that is ready to be served

Name: Bread knife
Purpose in food preparation: To cut soft bread

Name: Browning tray
Purpose in food preparation: Used in a microwave oven to help turn food brown

Name: Butter curler
Purpose in food preparation: Used to produce decorative butter shapes.

Name: Cake and pie server
Purpose in food preparation: To cut slices in pies or cakes, and then transfer to a plate or container

Name: Cheese knife
Purpose in food preparation: Used to cut cheese.

Name: Cheesecloth
Purpose in food preparation: To assist in the formation of cheese

Name: Chef's knife
Purpose in food preparation: Originally used to slice large cuts of beef, it is now the general utility knife for most Western cooks.

Name: Cherry pitter
Purpose in food preparation: Used for the removal of pits (stones) from cherries or olives.

Name: Chinoise
Purpose in food preparation: Straining substances such as custards, soups and sauces, or to dust food with powder

Name: Colander
Purpose in food preparation: Used for draining substances cooked in water

Name: Corkscrew
Purpose in food preparation: Pierces and removes a cork from a bottle.

Name: Crab cracker
Purpose in food preparation: Used to crack the shell of a crab or lobster

Name: Cutting board
Purpose in food preparation: A portable board on which food can be cut.

Name: Dough scraper
Purpose in food preparation: To shape or cut dough, and remove dough from a worksurface

Name: Egg piercer
Purpose in food preparation: Pierces the air pocket of an eggshell with a small needle to keep the shell from cracking during hard-boiling. If both ends of the shell are pierced, the egg can be blown out while preserving the shell (for crafts).

Name: Egg poacher
Purpose in food preparation: Holds a raw egg, and is placed inside a pot of boiling water to poach an egg.

Name: Egg separator
Purpose in food preparation: A slotted spoon-like utensil used to separate the yolk of an egg from the egg white.

Name: Egg slicer
Purpose in food preparation: Slicing peeled, hard-boiled eggs quickly and evenly.

Name: Egg timer
Purpose in food preparation: Used to correctly time the process of boiling eggs.

Name: Fillet knife
Purpose in food preparation: A long, narrow knife with a finely serrated blade, used to slice fine filet cuts of fish or other meat.

Name: Fish scaler
Purpose in food preparation: Used to remove the scales from the skin of fish before cooking

Name: Fish slice
Purpose in food preparation: Used for lifting or turning food during cooking

Name: Flour sifter
Purpose in food preparation: Blends flour with other ingredients and aerates it in the process.

Name: Food mill
Purpose in food preparation: Used to mash or sieve soft foods.

Name: Funnel
Purpose in food preparation: Used to channel liquid or fine-grained substances into containers with a small opening.

Name: Garlic press
Purpose in food preparation: Presses garlic cloves to create a puree, functioning like a specialized ricer.

Name: Grapefruit knife
Purpose in food preparation: Finely serrated knife for separating segments of grapefruit or other citrus fruit.

Name: Gravy strainer
Purpose in food preparation: A small pouring jug that separates roast meat drippings from melted fat, for making gravy.

Name: Herb chopper
Purpose in food preparation: Chops or minces raw herbs.

Name: Ladle
Purpose in food preparation: A ladle is a type of serving spoon used for soup, stew, or other foods.

Name: Lame
Purpose in food preparation: Used to slash the tops of bread loaves in artisan baking.

Name: Lemon reamer
Purpose in food preparation: A juicer with a fluted peak at the end of a short handle, where a half a lemon is pressed to release the juice.

Name: Lemon squeezer
Purpose in food preparation: A juicer, similar in function to a lemon reamer, with an attached bowl.

Name: Lobster pick
Purpose in food preparation: A long-handled, narrow pick, used to pull meat out of narrow legs and other parts of a lobster or crab.

Name: Measuring spoon
Purpose in food preparation: Typically sold in a set that measures dry or wet ingredients in amounts from 1/4 teaspoon (1.25 ml) up to 1 tablespoon (15 ml).

Name: Meat grinder
Purpose in food preparation: Operated with a hand-crank, this presses meat through a chopping or pureeing attachment.

Name: Melon baller
Purpose in food preparation: Small scoop used to make smooth balls of melon or other fruit, or potatoes.

Name: Mezzaluna
Purpose in food preparation: To finely and consistently chop/mince foods, especially herbs.

Name: Mortar and pestle
Purpose in food preparation: To crush food, releasing flavours and aromas

Name: Nutcracker
Purpose in food preparation: To crack open the hard outer shell of various nuts.

Name: Nutmeg grater
Purpose in food preparation: A small, specialized grating blade for nutmeg.

Name: Oven glove
Purpose in food preparation: To protect hands from burning when handling hot pots or trays.

Name: Pastry bag
Purpose in food preparation: To evenly dispense soft substances (doughs, icings, fillings, etc.).

Name: Pastry blender
Purpose in food preparation: Cuts into pastry ingredients, such as flour and butter, for blending and mixing while they are in a bowl. It is made of wires curved into a crescent shape and held by a rigid handle.[4]

Name: Pastry brush
Purpose in food preparation: To spread oil, juices, sauce or glaze on food.

Name: Pastry wheel
Purpose in food preparation: Cuts straight or crimped lines through dough for pastry or pasta.

Name: Pepper mill
Alternative names: Burr mill, burr grinder, pepper grinder

Name: Poultry shears
Purpose in food preparation: Used for dejointing and cutting uncooked poultry; reinforced with a spring, they have one serrated blade and pointed tips.

Name: Ricer
Purpose in food preparation: Presses very smooth vegetable mashes or purees, operates similar to a meat grinder/mincer.

Name: Rolling pin
Purpose in food preparation: A long, rounded wooden or marble tool rolled across dough to flatten it.

Name: Spider
Alternative names: sieves, spoon sieves, spoon skimmers, or basket skimmers
Purpose in food preparation: For removing hot food from a liquid or skimming foam off when making broths

Name: Sugar thermometer
Purpose in food preparation: Measuring the temperature, or stage, of sugar

Name: Tamis
Purpose in food preparation: Used as a strainer, grater, or food mill.

Name: Tin opener
Purpose in food preparation: To open tins or cans

Name: Tomato knife
Purpose in food preparation: Used to slice through tomatoes.

Name: Tongs
Purpose in food preparation: For gripping and lifting. Usually used to move items on hot surfaces, such as barbecues, or to select small or grouped items, such as sugar cubes or salad portions.

Name: Trussing needle
Purpose in food preparation: For pinning, or sewing up, poultry and other meat.

Name: Whisk
Alternative names: Balloon whisk, gravy whisk, flat whisk, flat coil whisk, bell whisk, and other types.
Purpose in food preparation: To blend ingredients smooth, or to incorporate air into a mixture, in a process known as whisking or whipping

Name: Wooden spoon
Purpose in food preparation: For mixing and stirring during cooking and baking.

Name: Zester
Purpose in food preparation: For obtaining zest from lemons and other citrus fruit.
